name: sikka-buya
description: A digital application for displaying and exploring islamic coinage.
author: Severin Opel

scripts.install: cd backend && yarn install && cd ../frontend && yarn install
scripts.test:cypress: concurrently -k -n "BACKEND,CYPRESS,VUE"  -c "magenta,cyan,blue" "npm run test:backend " "npm run test:cypress-app" "npm run frontend"
scripts.test:cypress:run: concurrently -k -n "BACKEND,CYPRESS,VUE"  -c "magenta,cyan,blue" "npm run test:backend " "npm run test:cypress-run" "npm run frontend"
scripts.test:cypress:record: concurrently -k -n "BACKEND,CYPRESS,VUE"  -c "magenta,cyan,blue" "npm run test:backend " "npm run test:cypress-record" "npm run frontend"
scripts.test:cypress-record: wait-on http://localhost:4000 && wait-on http://localhost:8080 && cd test && node cypress-run.js
scripts.test:cypress-run: wait-on http://localhost:4000 && wait-on http://localhost:8080 && cd test && npx cypress run
scripts.test:cypress-app: wait-on http://localhost:4000 && wait-on http://localhost:8080 && cd test && cypress open
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && pm2 delete all && npm run pm2
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
